mapper.select: select c.NAME dataAxis,count(e.PERSON_ID) data from HR_EMPLOYEE e inner join HR_COMPANY c on c.COMPANY_ID=e.COMPANY_ID group by c.NAME
select p.POSITION_NAME dataAxis,count(e.PERSON_ID) data from HR_EMPLOYEE e inner join HR_POSITION p on p.POSITION_ID=e.POSITION_ID group by p.POSITION_NAME
select b.OBJECT_TEXT dataAxis,count(e.PERSON_ID) data from HR_EMPLOYEE e inner JOIN T_S_BASECODE b on b.CATEGORYID=2 and b.OBJECT_VALUE=e.DEGREE group by b.OBJECT_TEXT
